verses.roman:
eka-dina 'daśa' 'biśa' āise nimantraṇa
bhaṭṭācārya ekera mātra karena grahaṇa

synonyms: eka-dina—in one day; daśa biśa—ten to twenty; āise—come; nimantraṇa—the invitations; bhaṭṭācārya—Balabhadra Bhaṭṭācārya; ekera—of one of them; mātra—only; karena grahaṇa—accepts.
translation: In one day, ten to twenty invitations were received, but Balabhadra Bhaṭṭācārya would accept only one of them.
